content: It's hard to say which album had the biggest influence overall as they all had significant impacts on the music industry and shaped different genres in different ways. However, some would argue that The Beatles' Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band made the biggest impact as it marked the beginning of a new era in music and inspired countless musicians to experiment with new techniques and sounds. It's considered a landmark in the history of popular music and is still regarded as one of the greatest albums ever recorded.
